cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)

exm.mng: to engulf, to bury, to overlook, to stifle, to neglect, to fall into oblivion
to complain, to grumble (about), to reproach, to blame
to bury, to hide by burying, hidden
to pay the bill (in a restaurant etc) (loanword from Cantonese), (fig.) to bear responsibility
to immerse oneself in, engrossed in sth, to lower the head (e.g. to avoid rain), countersunk (of screws, rivets etc)
to ambush, to lie in wait for, to lie low, ambush
Ambush from ten sides (pipa solo piece), House of Flying Daggers (2004 movie by Zhang Yimou 張藝謀|张艺谋[Zhang1 Yi4 mou2])
